name: The Sovereign's Compass
fieldIntelligence: To activate the capacity to navigate the world from a place of integrated, sovereign wholeness. This Meta-Glyph combines a luminous, transparent presence (Ω28) with a deeply integrated sense of self (inferred as Ω45) to produce wise, coherent action in the world (inferred as Ω48). It is the engine of a fully actualized being acting in alignment with their truest nature.
